Package com.toy_store.java.marketing

Class Store

java.lang.Object
com.toy_store.java.marketing.Store
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Store
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a Toy-Store.
The class is designed so that there's never more than one Store instance. Therefore, there is no public constructor. You obtain a Store instance using the getInstance() method.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • getInstance

      public static Store getInstance()
      Method used to get the instance of the store.
      Returns:
      the instance of the store

    • displayWelcome

      public void displayWelcome()
      Displays a message on startup.

    • loadCSV

      public void loadCSV​(java.lang.String filename)
      Loads a list of products from a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file

    • saveCSV

      public void saveCSV​(java.lang.String filename)
      Save all products present on the store into a CSV file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file

    • loadStore

      public static void loadStore​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException, java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
      Loads a previous state of the store from a file. The current state of the store si lost!
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the file does not exists
      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the file does not contain a store

    • saveStore

      public void saveStore​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Saves the current state of the store into a file.
      Parameters:
      filename - the name of the file
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurred

    • addProduct

      public void addProduct​(Product product) throws DuplicateProductException
      Adds a product to the store.
      Parameters:
      product - the product to be added
      Throws:
      DuplicateProductException - if the product already exists in the store

    • getProduct

      public java.lang.String getProduct​(java.lang.String uniqueId) throws ProductNotFoundException
      Gets the String representation of a product from the store based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      uniqueId - the ID of the product
      Returns:
      the String representation of the product
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - if the product does not exists

    • getProducts

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getProducts()
      Returns a list of all products from the store (as Strings).
      Returns:
      the list of products

    • getProductsByManufacturer

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getProductsByManufacturer​(java.lang.String manufacturerName) throws ManufacturerNotFoundException
      Returns a list of products (as Strings) produced by the manufacturer given as parameter.
      Parameters:
      manufacturerName - the name of the manufacturer
      Returns:
      the list of products
      Throws:
      ManufacturerNotFoundException

    • addManufacturer

      public void addManufacturer​(Manufacturer manufacturer)
      Adds a new manufacturer to the store.
      Parameters:
      manufacturer - the manufacturer to be added.

    • getManufacturers

      the list of manufacturers

    • getCurrency

      public Currency getCurrency()
      Gets the currency of the store.
      Returns:
      the currency of the store

    • changeCurrency

      public void changeCurrency​(java.lang.String currencyName) throws CurrencyNotFoundException
      Changes the current currency of the store to the one given as parameter.
      Parameters:
      currencyName - the name of the new currency
      Throws:
      CurrencyNotFoundException - if the currency does not exists

    • createDiscount

      public void createDiscount​(java.lang.String name, DiscountType discountType, double value)
      Created a new discount for the products on the store.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the discount
      discountType - the type of the discount
      value - the value of the discount

    • applyDiscount

      public void applyDiscount​(java.lang.String type, double value) throws DiscountNotFoundException, NegativePriceException
      Applies an existing discount to all products in the store. If any of the prices goes negative, the discount won't be applied.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the discount
      value - the value of the discount
      Throws:
      DiscountNotFoundException - if the dicount does not exist
      NegativePriceException - the any of the prices goes negative

    • getDiscounts

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDiscounts()
      Gets a list of all discounts (as Strings) in the store.
      Returns:
      the list of discounts

    • calculateTotal

      public double calculateTotal​(java.util.List<java.lang.String> idList) throws ProductNotFoundException
      Calculates the total price of the products from the list given as parameter. If any of the products doesn't exist, an exception is thrown. If the quantity of any of the products is lowers than the amount requested, an exception is thrown and the quantity present in the store is used.
      Parameters:
      idList - the list of IDs
      Returns:
      the total price of the products
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - if any of the products does not exist
